metadata.title: CVE-2022-20488 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: In NotificationChannel of NotificationChannel.java, there is a possiblefailure to persist permissions settings due to resource exhaustion. Thiscould lead to local escalation of privilege with no additional executionprivileges needed. User interaction is not needed for exploitation.Product:AndroidVersions: Android-10 Android-11 Android-12 Android-12LAndroid-13Android ID: A-242703217

criterions.comment: android-platform-frameworks-base package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
